title: having to do a 1v9 in a bot game
body:
riot get your stuff together and get employees or hire people to play bot games all day to ban these bots that are coming into the game and probably selling accounts to people to make month of using third party programs i have had it with going into a bot game to test out new rune and mastery pages for champs or tweaking my current pages for champs and then having to deal with a 20min game that you cant do anything because of these people that are scripting accounts to play and get level 30 account to either 1 sell them to other people or 2 get the lvl 30 grind out of the way. it is getting out of control 

so please DO SOMETHING ABOUT THIS

replies.body: I'll happily take up this wonderful career opportunity
